import api from'./api';// User related API calls
const userService={// Get all users
getUsers:()=>{return api.get('/users');},// Get single user by ID
getUser:id=>{return api.get(`/users/${id}`);},// Create new user
createUser:userData=>{return api.post('/users',userData);},// Update user
updateUser:(id,userData)=>{return api.put(`/users/${id}`,userData);},// Reset user password (admin only)
resetPassword:(id,newPassword)=>{return api.post(`/users/${id}/reset-password`,{newPassword});},// Delete user
deleteUser:id=>{return api.delete(`/users/${id}`);}};export default userService;
